sn36.3:1.3: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn36.3:1.4: Sukhaya, bhikkhave, vedanaya raganusayo pahatabbo, dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo pahatabbo, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo pahatabbo.
sn36.3:1.5: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo pahino hoti, dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo pahino hoti, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo pahino hoti, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu niranusayo sammaddaso acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa’ti.
